main_content.content: Dental and technical products store in Dushanbe.

info.short_info: In 2009 the company Medstomatekhnika LLC was founded. Its main focus was the purchase and sale of dental and technical consumables. Since 2019, Medstomatekhnika LLC has cooperated with the UN providing warehousing and storage services for medical products. It was decided to create a new company that will work in the field of dentistry, after which the company 'Darmon Tachkhizot LLC was founded.'

person_2.name: Abubakr Nazirmadov
person_2.education: University of Science and technology Beijing

advantages.advantages_short_info: We value our customers and therefore we sell equipment and products only from those manufacturers, the quality of the products does not raise doubts and complaints.
